page.title: 16Home Life in Sth Benfleet.
page.content: Before my mum calls me with a cup of tea in the morning,I play some games on my computer in my bedroom.I have cereal or toast for breakfast and then go to my friend John's house.He and his sister walk to school with me, but she always goes to the newsagents to get some sweets.My mum has a part_time job at the Post_Office and is home when I return from school.My older sister Penny goes to Appleton School, and is home before me,but she has to do a lot of homework.I go out to play on my bike.I take sandwiches to school for lunch,but I have a big dinner when Dad comes home from the City where he works in an insurance firm. Quite often he is late because there is something wrong with the trains. Then he moans at Penny because she eats her dinner while watching TV. She likes Top of the Pops especially.
